unnormalised: My cousin, Priya from IIT Delhi, swears by Calm after watching "Dear Zindagi." She says its guided meditations really helped her during exam stress. It reminded her of her Nani's stories. I tried it too and found some peace after a crazy day at work. Maybe it's worth a try!
normalised: My cousin, Priya from I I T Delhi, swears by Calm after watching "Dear Zindagi." She says its guided meditations really helped her during exam stress. It reminded her of her Nani's stories. I tried it too and found some peace after a crazy day at work. Maybe it's worth a try!
